Description:
Welcome Home!
Bathed in natural light & located in one of Craigieburn's finest & most exclusive pockets, is this timeless & elegant family home which is sure to impress.
Embracing in character & immaculately presented with pride, the home's free-flowing design highlights 4 bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & ensuite), main family bathroom & downstairs guest powder room (3rd WC).
Versatile living includes large formal lounge, huge gourmet kitchen with expansive storage & bench space, complimented by an oversized open-plan living/dining area with stacker doors that effortlessly lead outside to a private decked pergola area, surrounded by an immaculately maintained garden space.
Further features include; 9ft ceilings, tiled splashback, heating, double remote garage with drive-through-access, front porch & much more.
Opposite St Andrews Drive Reserve, it's also close to Craigieburn (18-hole) Golf Course, Fairways Park as well as popular shopping centres, schools & easy access to the Hume Freeway. Amazing family lifestyle - don't miss this one!
Insights: 15 St Andrews Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
4 BEDROOMS 3 LIVING ZONES, 2 BACKYARDS ON 509 M2 APPROX. OF LAND
A functional family friendly floor plan and north facing aspect create the perfect family haven. Multiple living zones, great bedroom accommodation and a traditional backyard are the vital ingredients of this well presented home that can also cater for all those who require extra space for recreational vehicles.
Comprising three distinctive livings areas which include casual sitting zone, an open plan family meals area and rumpus room/potential 5th bedroom, the homes design is one that will be a favourite amongst many. A Galley style kitchen is smartly placed to promote gatherings, whilst the extensively decked alfresco dining features a main gas line that can allow for cooking outside all year round.
A large backyard is the ideal place for kids to run wild whilst the blocks extra wide frontage delivers the ability for boats, cars trailers or caravans to access side yard and adds scope for more garaging or storage.
Other highlights include stone benches throughout, quality drapes, ducted heating, 900mm appliances, spilt system heating/ cooling, dishwasher, evaporative cooling, alarm system, internally accessed auto garage and garden shed.
Situated across the road from Brickwood Park, 1.5kms from Craigieburn Central & Splash Aquatic Centre and minutes from
popular Golden Sun Moth Park, Highlands Shopping Centre / Hotel, Aitkin Creek Primary school, Aitkin Blvd and much more.
Please Note

Description:
The Wait Is Over
Designed for easy living, while boasting comfort and style that will delight all home buyers, this 1 year old home will satisfy all that is required to call home. With government grants available for first home buyers ,potential great rental returns and space for a family to move into. this property ticks all the boxes.
Expertly crafted features include:
• 4 Bedrooms BIR
• Master bedroom with WIR and Ensuite
• Open plan meals and living
• High quality central kitchen
• Study / second living zone
• High ceilings throughout
• Double garage with internal access
• Ducted heating with zoning
• Evaporative cooling with zoning
• Alfresco area
• Landscaped gardens
Within close proximity to Newbury Primary school,Child care facility, Hume Anglican Grammar school and other local amenities
including Highland Shopping Centre, Highland Hotel, Parklands and Public transport..

Description:
Spacious Family Entertainer
Nestled in an established area and offering great convenience to all amenities, this well-presented five bedroom single level residence is sure to be a hit with first home buyers, families & investors. Sitting on a substantial block of land 650sqm (approx.), the home's current layout offers immediate comfort and space with large open plan living, dining area and plenty of natural light. Comprising a central two-way bathroom, well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and ample cupboard space, separate meals area, and a huge family room which leads outside to the backyard where you can entertain family and friends all year round under the covered alfresco. With features including heating & cooling, coonara fireplace, formal lounge & double remote garage with drive-through. Close to Craigieburn Central, primary school, parklands, buses and freeway access.
Insights: 10 Midhurst Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
IMMACULATE FAMILY HOME WITH ELITE ADDRESS
This beautifully presented home offers floorplan versatility & first-class features which highlight the allure of this sensational family home providing absolute quality & style in one of Craigieburn's most aspirational neighborhoods.
Cleverly zoned for large scale gatherings, the home comprises of 3 large bedrooms, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, fully equipped kitchen with 900ml stainless steel free standing oven, dishwasher & walk in pantry overlooking a spacious meals area & oversized family room.
Outside, a fabulous enclosed alfresco entertaining area & wonderfully private backyard garden offering low-maintenance ease. Surrounded by other homes of quality & class, it also offers easy access to Craigieburn's best facilities including Craigieburn Central Shopping Precinct, Schools, Splash Aquatic Centre, Medical Services, parks & trails, public transport & so much more!
Extra features include a double remote garage, high ceilings, separate study, alarm system, evaporative cooling/ducted heating, main bathroom with oversized shower & ceiling fans in all bedrooms & lounge. Come inside and appreciate the amazing size of the home and all it has to offer!
Insights: 23 Hyde Park Avenue, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Lakeview Perfection!!
Located opposite the lake this near-new townhouse is positioned in one of Craigieburn's most sought-after pockets. This 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom (3 toilet) townhouse is perfect for any first home buyer, investor or downsizer looking to purchase in a quiet and family orientated community with uninterrupted lake views.
Upon entry the spacious lounge leads you to the open plan kitchen/meal area, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & stone benchtops. All rooms come with large windows to allow natural light to flood in. Offering 2 great sized bedrooms both with ensuite's, heating & cooling, a single car remote control garage, and lots of storage.
Ideally located and central to Craigieburn shopping centre, Craigieburn Junction, Splash Aqua Park, local schools & parkland.
Insights: 13 Bayano Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Magnificent East Facing Home, Paradise Within!!!
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this east facing 4 bedroom home that could be an end to your exploration for a perfect home for your family. This home has a blend of practicality and class. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most Popular Estates and Tightly held streets amongst quality Homes and Parklands.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 4 Spacious Bedrooms (Master Bedroom with walk in robe/shelves and full ensuite), other 3 Bedrooms with BIR.
- CENTRAL BATHROOM: Spacious Central Bathroom with a Bath Tub and an Elaborative Shower.
- KITCHEN: The kitchen comprises 900 mm Stainless Steel Appliances, Electric Oven, Tile Splash Back, Ample Cupboard Space with Walk In Pantry, Sky Light and Double Fridge Space
- LIVING AREAS: It has 2 living areas. Formal Lounge and Open Plan Family/ Living/Dining Area.
- STUDY ROOM: A separate spacious Study/Pray Room.
- LAUNDRY: Spacious Laundry with Linen Cupboard and Overhead Cupboard Space.
- PARKING: Double Car Garage with Ducted Heating connection and Remote Control Access.
-BACKYARD: Low maintenance backyard with Veggie Patch.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: 1200 mm Wide Welcoming Door, Concrete throughout the house, Covered Alfresco with Gas and Waterpoints, Side Access, Downlights, Chandlers, Ducted Heating, Customised Curtains, Powder Room, Stone Benchtops and Split System.
- LOCATION: With all the amenities close by including Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Highlands Shopping Centre, Aitken Creek Primary School, Newbury Primary School, Mount Ridley College, Craigieburn Primary School, Local Shops, Public Transport, Bus Stop and Child Care Facilities.
Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!
If you're in the market for that perfect all round property then look no further than this.
Don't miss out! Call Achal Arora - 0432413929.

PRIME LOCATION NEXT TO STATION !!
A big house close to station and shops with a potential of subdivision into multi-unit site (STCA), easy maintenance build and a great location. Set on a 656 m2 approx. block, this house is easy to access and exudes charm the moment you step inside. Situated within walking distance to Craigieburn Train Station, Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn Secondary School, Child Care as well as Hume Highway.
This House features :
- 3 large bedrooms all with mirror sliding BIR
- 2 bathrooms
- Formal lounge
- Granny Flat (Potential)
- Spacious kitchen with open plan living/dining, ample of
cupboards and laminated benchtops
- Laundry with access to the backyard
- Car Garage
- Alfresco
- Extras : Ducted heating, Split system cooling, wood fire
heater, wooden floorboards, downlights, ceiling fans, gas
cooktop, electric oven, beautiful garden and views.
This house ticks all the boxes for First Home Buyers and Investors. Dont miss out this opportunity, register your interest today.

Description:
LUXURY AND IMMPRESIVE
Impression that lasts, this luxurious double story family home is well presented and situated within the Highlands Estate set on a block of land. 420m2
Offers are 3 good sized floorboard bedrooms, HUGE master with double vanity ensuite, walk in robe, tiles flooring the rest of the house, 2 living rooms and Study room. A well-appointed kitchen with Cezar stone bench top, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and walk-in pantry, adjoining to the open plan meals and family area along with separate formal lounge and large decking alfresco area with landscaped gardens.
A Long list of other extras include a double garage, upstairs living room, ducted heating & cooling, quality window furnishings including timber plantation shutters, balcony, chic light fittings, intercom.
Within close proximity to local amenities as well as Craigieburn Central, Highlands Shopping Precinct & Hotel, and just a stone throw away from local parkland, public transport, schools & sporting facilities. Inspect fast as this one will not last

Description:
One more SOLD by SKAD !! 3 buyers missed on this !!
This well-loved custom designed family home will meet your evolving lifestyle as your family grows. Its design provides good open living areas where parents can supervise young children and also offering separate living areas to entertain family and friends.
Set on a good size block measuring approx 520m2, boasting manicured garden at the front and low maintenance at the rear and sides.
Inside, the huge master bedroom makes you feel like king style living.
Other important features are as follows:
- 4 bedrooms (3 with walk-in-robes and 4th with M-in-robes)
- Formal garden greeting you to a welcoming entrance with high ceilings.
- Fabulous centrally located hostess kitchen with lots of cupboards, butler pantry, slick
splashback & stainless steel quality appliances.
- Ducted heating & evaporative cooling system.
- Sperate loung.
- Solar Panels.
- Features Walls.
- Side Excess from Outside.
- Alfresco ideal for outdoor entertaining.
- Security alarm and camera System.
- Internal access from double lock up garage with storage cupboards and remote control.
Resting in a prestigious location; this contemporary residence is located just moments from parklands, bike and walking trails, outdoor BBQ facilities, schools, shopping Centre, bus line, and easy access to all amenities. This home will delight you and your family, so don't hesitate to call me for a private inspection or meet me there at the Open for inspection.
Photo ID required for all inspections.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List:
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
A RENOVATED GEM WITH 7 CAR ACCOMODATION ONLY MINUTES TO TRAIN STATION
This rejuvenated home on 649m2 of land perfectly accommodates those who want something like new and value space and convenience.
Ideal for 1st home buyers or investors alike the floorplan features a light filled lounge room, modern kitchen with 900mm appliances and adjacent meals area. The three bedrooms are completed with built in robes whilst master comprises a full ensuite. Also boasting floor to ceiling tiled bathrooms, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans and curtains.
The extra-large block allows for a long driveway with garage and carport that can accommodate up to 7 cars or recreational vehicles (boats, caravans and trailers). The large rear yard is ideal for kids to play but could also be utilised for possible dual occupancy potential (S.T.C.A)
Situated only minutes from Craigieburn Plaza, Train Station, Craigieburn Secondary College, Hothlyn Drive Shops and much more
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
A GEM ON NEWBURY BLVD IMMACULATE HOME WITH 3 SEPARATE LIVING ZONES!!
Welcome to this massive double story delight Porter Davis home to be admired by family and friends. This corner block home, when it comes to location, this beauty is sure a winner! With shops, schools, transport, parks, and other amenities all close by. This beautifully presented home offers floorplan versatility & first-class features highlight the allure of this sensational family home providing absolute quality & style in one of Craigieburn's most aspirational neighborhoods.
Upon entrance, you will be welcomed by open space and wide corridors which has a generous study/lounge leading on to the massive living room. Walkthrough to the open plan kitchen, with high-class 900mm quality appliances throughout and stone benchtop with which opens up to huge butler's pantry for that extra storage space.
Massive family area is complemented with separate meals/dining space which opens up to the backyard and oversized undercover alfresco area.
This 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom, 3 separate toilets, double garage family home with formal and informal living areas that are ideal for the growing family. Superb master suite with spacious balcony having beautiful views and And 3 good size bedrooms with b.i.r.s, large living areas on the ground floor and one upstairs
This property is centrally located for ease and convenience.
Built with high inclusions and eye for perfection this home will be a prized possession for one lucky buyer. Inspection is a must for luxury home buyers with a taste for perfection!
Showcases a generous open plan kitchen with a walk-in pantry featuring stone benches & stainless-steel appliances, Additional extras include ducted heating, remote control garage, alfresco and low-maintenance surrounds inspection is a must.
Outside, a fabulous enclosed alfresco entertaining area & wonderfully private backyard garden offering low-maintenance ease. surrounded by other homes of quality & class, it also offers great exposure for a home business, easy access to Craigieburn's best facilities including Craigieburn central shopping precinct, schools, splash aquatic Centre, medical services, parks & trails, public transport & so much more!
expect all the modern features which include a remote garage, high ceilings, alarm with video intercom, evaporative cooling through-out & a separate split system downstairs. come inside and appreciate the amazing size of the home and all it has to offer!
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character for all home buyers and investors alike. Offering fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances dishwasher & double ovens, main bathroom, master bedroom with built in robe and ensuite, open plan meals area with adjoining family room, formal lounge, study/optional 4th bedroom, alarm system, double lock up garage with internal access and much more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with under cover alfresco & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. A host of extras include high ceilings, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, beautifully maintained carefree gardens and more. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & close to parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central shopping center, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Feature Rich Family Home in Ultimate location
This magnificent sun drenched, 4-bedroom family home is located in one of the most sought after pockets of Craigieburn and has everything you desired for. Proudly sitting on a large block of approx. 510 m2, will win your heart, boasting 2.7 m high ceilings, plenty of natural light and park frontage. An ideal family home for a lucky buyer looking for space and quality, featuring the finest details of everyday living.
You will love this immaculately presented home for
4- spacious bedrooms including master suite with full ensuite and walk in robes. Other 3- spacious bedrooms with mirrored robes. Main bathroom with large shower and
corner spa.
Park frontage.
Stunning gourmet kitchen offers plenty of bench & cupboard space includes top of the range 900 mm cooktops, extra-large island benchtop with breakfast bar and dishwasher.
Outdoor alfresco arena is entertainers delight, designed to enjoy all four weathers throughout the year.
Double garage with the convenience of drive through access.
Well maintained landscaped front and backyard.
Solar electricity to save on energy bill.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Other notable features are double glazed windows, ducted vacuum system, security alarm, video intercom, ceiling fans throughout, solar boosted hot water system and much more.
Only a short walk to Bus Stop, Hume Tennis Court, Aitkin Creek Primary school, Hume Library, Splash Aquatic Centre, Craigieburn Central Shopping and a short drive to Hume Anglican Grammar School, Craigieburn Station and very easy access to Hume freeway. If you are looking for a quality home, then your search ends here.
Inspection is a must.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
TWILIGHT AUCTION....
Here is a wonderful opportunity for the growing family and investors seeking modern design and convenience. Nestled in the quiet pockets of Craigieburn this beautifully presented family home will definitely tick all your boxes. Surrounded by an abundance of local amenities such as Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, schools, childcare facilities, restaurants, Splash Aqua Park and Leisure Centre, Hume Library, park lands, transport and much more.
The home offers:
# Over Sized Master Bedroom with WIR
# 3 bedrooms with BIR
# Open Study
# Massive Open plan (Living | Dining)
# Beautiful Kitchen with stainless steel appliances & large walk-in pantry
# Central Bathroom and Toilet
# Separate laundry
# Double lock up Garage
Extra's Include:
# Refrigerating Cooling & Heating plus fire place
# Dishwasher
# Landscaping
# Another Kitchen in the Alfresco area
# Downlights
Please contact Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542 to arrange your inspection today. Properties with this character & location do not last long. Photo ID will be required at all inspections.

Description:
Convenient location
All amenities at your fingertip, walking distance to school and college, the junction and the central, the splash and bus stop, minutes drive to Hume highway etc.
On offer is three bedrooms a master with Ensuite and built in robe and two other bedrooms are serviced by a central bathroom.
An open plan kitchen with a walk-in pantry, dishwasher, overlooking a meal area and a lounge.
Other features include are ducted heating and cooling, single garage.
An alfresco and a big backyard.
All this on approx.350m2 land
Enquire today.

Description:
Single Level, Low Maintenance.
Perfect for the first home buyer or investor, soak up the good life in this contemporary three-bedroom residence situated in the peaceful highlands estate. Single-level, low maintenance in a convenient location, this property presents the perfect start for any young homeowners.
Featuring;
Three bedrooms total, all with built in storage
Master bedroom with full ensuite, walk through robe and exterior roller shutters
Open living kitchen and dining area opening out to the outdoor courtyard
Kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and walk in pantry
Courtyard freshly concreted with Colorbond fencing surrounding
Main bathroom with separate bath and shower
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling with NBN internet connectivity
Single car remote lockup garage
